remarks: Eliminate a hypothesis which is a predicate expressing membership in the result of an operator (deduction version).  See ~ ghomgrplem for an example of its use.  (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 25-Mar-2008.)
statement:
elimdelov.1 $e |- ( ph -> C e. ( A F B ) ) $.
elimdelov.2 $e |- Z e. ( X F Y ) $.
elimdelov $p |- if ( ph , C , Z ) e. ( if ( ph , A , X ) F if ( ph , B , Y ) ) $.
